Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Feb2018/NGFMSSILFeb18]]> SID Calculation Issue Affecting NG FMS Aircraft
This Service Information Letter (SIL) describes an anomaly that prevents certain Flight Management Systems from correctly displaying and tracking SID procedures that have a significant course change... Radar Corner <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Feb2018/WS1Feb18]]> Understanding Airborne Windshear Detection Systems - Part One
The largest recorded microburst occurred right after Air Force 1 landed at Andrews AFB. The wind direction and speed changed 180 degrees and 109 knots... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Feb2018/WS1Feb18]]>
